column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A woman driving a Prius crashed into two motorbikes and and a shop front causing serious damage.------The incident occurred at 7:40 pm on December 30
column4: 2019 along the corner of 146th Street in Sangkat Phsar Kandal 1
column8: a woman driving the car with license plate 2BE-1476 in the north-south direction lost control and left the road and hit the motorbikes and a phone shop. Luckily no injuries were reported.------After the incident
column9: authorities arrived at the scene and measured and took the vehicle away to await further settlement. ------TVFB
